General.Name: NextSource Materials Inc
General.Description: NextSource Materials Inc. acquires, explores for, and develops mineral properties in Madagascar and Canada. The company primarily explores for graphite and vanadium deposits. Its flagship property is the 100% owned Molo graphite mine project located in the Southern Madagascar Region, Madagascar. The company was formerly known as Energizer Resources Inc. The company was founded in 2004 and is headquartered in Toronto, Canada.
General.Address: Exchange Tower, Toronto, ON, Canada, M5X 2A2

1.Name: Mr. Marc  Johnson C.F.A., CPA, CFA, CPA
